snippet.title: Dice Legacy - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Dice Legacy, a dice-based survival city builder set on a mysterious ringworld, is coming to Nintendo Switch summer 2021!

Your journey starts at the shores of the mysterious Ring World where you lay the foundation for your settlement. Harvest resources, let your population evolve and guide your village into the future.

Explore the secrets hidden in the Fog of War, bring light into the dark and solve the mystery of the obscure foreign inhabitants: the Others.

The Dice will be your companions at all times – but they are moody mates who are going to give your destiny the right amount of variety.

#Dice #NintendoSwitch 

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
